tool_description: This API contains useful information regarding countries, activities to do, country images, and many more.
name: Travel Info API
title: Travel Info API

api_list.name: Find an Embassy in Abroad
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the source country's embassy in destination country.

api_list.name: Get Country Details
api_list.description: This endpoint returns detailed information of specified country. The returned values are country name,  continent, official languages, capital city, government type, border length, surface area both in kilometer square and miles square as well as population density and neighbouring countries.

api_list.name: Get Country Activities
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the most famous touristic activities for the specified country

api_list.name: Get Brief Information About A Country
api_list.description: This endpoint returns brief information regarding the specified country, and country images.
